20110105000007.000|20110105000008.000|CC1|PREPARING FOR THE MOST          
20110105000008.000|20110105000010.000|CC1|IMPORTANT TOUR OF HIS LIFE,     
20110105000010.000|20110105000011.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO PROSECUTORS.       
20110105000011.000|20110105000013.000|CC1|A MAJOR WORLD EVENT.            
20110105000013.000|20110105000016.000|CC1|DEPUTY D.A. TOLD THE COURT      
20110105000016.000|20110105000018.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY JACKSON HIRED        
20110105000018.000|20110105000019.000|CC1|DR. CONRAD MURRAY WHO
